Title: Relates to the crime of aggravated harassment of an employee by an inmate
Summary: Relates to the crime of aggravated harassment of an employee by an inmate and requires any imprisonment imposed by such conviction run consecutively to any undischarged term of imprisonment to which the defendant is subject.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the crime of aggravated harassment of an employee by an inmate
